summary: No one has head of the shadowguard, the leaders of the dark brotherhood and their listener until now.....Discover the listeners lair!
descriptionHtml:
After seeing the new tribunal robes mod in black specifically and a few other evil/dark armour sets i began to use them for my vampire lord/evil character, Who is the listener of the dark brotherhood. However i immediately had a problem.....i had kickass armour and was an all powerfull assassin vampire DB listener yet somehow bethedsa deemed it fit for me to live in a awful little room of the dank boring DB dawnstar sanctuary.....After siving through player homes for hours i couldnt find one to my liking. So i watched \"BestInSlots\" (which is really helpful really recomend it) creation kit tutorial taught myself how to use it and this was what i came up with, it is my first mod however and is still incomplete but i thought i wack it up a see what you guys thought.

[] THE LISTENERS LAIR [] 

A heavily modded player home aimed at those young apsiring evil genius\' out there wanting a base of operations. This was a mod purely for my own personal perposes as a DB listener house but i thought why not.

INCLUDED SO FAR:
 -> Entry foyer/reception area
 -> Personal Quarters
 -> Dungeon
 -> Throne Room (has armours and dining area in it) [IINCOMPLETE]

TO DO LIST:
 -> Few more rooms need navmeshing
 -> Will COMPLETELY redo the throne room area to fit in more with the other two rooms architecture/overall feel.
 -> Crafting area [thought id forgot? ;) ] 
 -> Shadowguards in the reception area
 -> Redo the outside apperance (i hate it!) [it was a quick botch job just so i could see what everything looked liked and linked together dont worry it WILL be alot better]


I do have a lore friendly story behind this and will edventually add it for all you lore friendly abiders out there!

FUTURE PLANS:
I am planning to connect this with alot more dark brotherhood orientated mods as i felt that for a massive all powerful assassin organisation they are severly lacking in presence so i will be adding DB mini sancuaries in most cities with a few DB NPC\'s/Followers. Just so it feel a little more realistic of a massive assasin cult.
